name: arcane-blessings

scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'New v.' && git push origin main
scripts.ci: pnpm run lint && node format_exports.js && pnpm run test && pnpm run build
scripts.release: pnpm run lint && node format_exports.js && pnpm run test && pnpm run build && changeset publish

author: Lukas Stateczny
description: List of special powers and abilities for crypties cards.
